DESCRIPTION: Once an enemy's finished attacking, deals damage back.
You can only have one #yWeather at a time.
At the end of your turn, deal #b4 damage to ALL enemies. NL Upon exiting this #yWeather, gain #b1 #yMetallicize.
Reduce received #yAttack damage by #b20%. NL Upon exiting this #yWeather, add a #ySeed+ to your hand.
Draw a card at the start of your turn. NL Upon exiting this #yWeather, gain [E] .
The enemy loses HP at the end of each turn. NL When the enemy dies, heal HP.
Your next card that grants you #yBlock grants you additional #yBlock.
Whenever you are attacked, apply #yPoison back.
Activate exiting effects of your current #yWeather without exiting it.
